arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Ajax Prediction: Can Maresca’s Side Earn Fourth Straight Win?
arts.sum: Will Enzo Maresca's Blues continue their recent upturn? We look ahead to Wednesday's Champions League game at Stamford Bridge with our Chelsea vs Ajax prediction and preview. The post Chelsea vs Ajax Prediction: Can Maresca’s Side Earn Fourth Straight Win? appeared first on Opta Analyst.

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Ajax predictions: Blues to make it three in a row for Ajax
arts.sum: Chelsea play host to Ajax in the Champions League on Wednesday and Jack Ogalbe expects the Blues to take all three points and condemn the visitors to a third straight European loss.
